tool_description: Configures load balancing for containerized applications with health checks and traffic distribution rules.

service_name.description: Name of the service to configure load balancing for

kubeconfig.description: Base64 encoded kubeconfig for cluster access

lb_type.description: Load balancer type: ClusterIP, NodePort, LoadBalancer, Ingress

error_messages: Service not found: Specified service does not exist in namespace.
Invalid load balancer type: Use one of [ClusterIP, NodePort, LoadBalancer, Ingress].
Port conflict: service_port already in use by another service.
Invalid port range: Ports must be between 1-65535.
Kubeconfig authentication failed: Verify kubeconfig credentials.
Invalid load balancing algorithm: Use one of [round-robin, least-connections, ip-hash].
usage: Provide service_name, namespace, kubeconfig, lb_type, target_port, and service_port. Optionally configure health_check_path and load_balancing_algorithm.
